title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, an error occurs and the synchronization fails.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the synchronization tool. 
2. Select a .java file and another resource to synchronize. 
3. Click on the synchronize button. 
4. Observe that the synchronization fails and an error message is displayed.
